animeDescription: Lufy, discovered floating lifeless in space, is brought on board a Solnoid cruiser and given another chance at life. Once the hardened warrior, she is shown events that shake her faith (one's own death seems to have a way of changing one's philosophy) and lessening her power as a fighter just as that power is most needed!   (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Gall Force 1: Eternal Story', 'Gall Force 3: Stardust War']
